Ramhorn/Koga Shuko/Anubis/Hades/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/The 
Oblitercons/Unitron/The Rock/Usurper:


Ramhorn stepped out of the CR chamber, refresh from his near 
termination-event.  Stretching, he took out his two laser pistols from the 
depths of subspace.  Checking them, he knew they were at full power, as was 
he, putting them away.  Heading for the control room (or bridge), he walked 
into the room, where Stinkbomb had died only a few hours ago, seeing an 
unknown robot (Teltoli) in their, putting its fingers near buttons, he took 
out his laser pistols aiming one at the back of Teltoli's head, the other at 
the middle of her back.  "Do not touch anything.  Slowly turn around with 
both arms in the air, I have two weapons aimed at you, and if you try 
anything, and I mean ANYTHING, I will kill you."

==================

Koga Shuko sighed, seeing his ship.  It had been damaged in the battle.  
Though they had taken the fight to two bases, damaging one badly, and 
destroying another.  All in all, a good day's work.  Stepping into the ship, 
he looked to Anubis and Hades.  "Get to the CR tanks, Unitron, set the 
autoguns, autocannons, and missile launchers to fire at ANYTHING that is not 
on our side, then get to a CR chamber."

"As you wish." all three said in unison, Anubis and Hades heading for the CR 
tanks, Unitron for the control room.

Koga Shuko walked slowly, not nearly as damaged as the ship, much less Anubis 
and Hades.  Just a few burns on his armor, which wasn't as shiny as he liked 
it.  It made him look like a commoner.  Instead of the bridge, a CR tank, his 
private CR tank, or even his own quarters, he headed towards the lab, holding 
the artificial fang, looking like it was actually made of calcium carbonate, 
belonging to a deceased Serpentor (though he didn't know that), smiling.  "We 
will see what comes from you my pretty little tooth, oh yes, we will indee." 
he mused, chuckling softly.

===========================

Usurper stood up, self destructing , the Rock going up in flames with him.  
(Yanshosh, don't really bother putting the Rock or Usurper up on the deceased 
page, they aren't important, and I didn't want to really keep them).

===========================

Outside of the Alliance base's CR Chambers, Breakdown looked to his leader, 
Dark One.  "Shall Hiss, Scavenger, and I go to the CR chamber in the crashed 
craft and guard it?"

"No...I don't want anyone getting suspicious with you three never around.  
Use these ones.  You left the defenses on, though minimal, it will let people 
know it is owned." 

All five opened a CR chamber, climbing in.

==========================

Nemesis Enforcer and Scattershot entered the CR room, stepping up to two 
seperate CR chambers.

"Slag, that Dark One is in here." Nemesis said, looking to Scattershot.

"They're all in a CR chamber."

"Son of a Quint." he said, walking over to the wall near the entrance, 
sitting down and waiting.
